content.raw:
If the goal is to remove all the provideFeedback support,

* Should we remove the SDF <provide_feedback> elements?
* There is also a test in test/sdf_deprecated/pr2_test.world with <provideFeedback> old tags. Should we removed the tags (or the whole test)?
* Should we remove the reading of the <provide_feedback> tag in [gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:109](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1ab8eb1630d4392bc77e7e6ea800be5994cee38d/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc#cl-109)?
* Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() overloaded method in [gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.cc:1227](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1ab8eb1630d4392bc77e7e6ea800be5994cee38d/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.cc#cl-1227)?
* Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() call in [gazebo/physics/BulletJoint.cc:351](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1ab8eb1630d4392bc77e7e6ea800be5994cee38d/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletJoint.cc#cl-351)?
* Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() method in [gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:629](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/1ab8eb1630d4392bc77e7e6ea800be5994cee38d/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc#cl-629)?

Probably, none of this makes any sense, but just in case.
content.html:
If the goal is to remove all the provideFeedback support,

  • Should we remove the SDF <provide_feedback> elements?
  • There is also a test in test/sdf_deprecated/pr2_test.world with <provideFeedback> old tags. Should we removed the tags (or the whole test)?
  • Should we remove the reading of the <provide_feedback> tag in gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:109?
  • Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() overloaded method in gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.cc:1227?
  • Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() call in gazebo/physics/BulletJoint.cc:351?
  • Should we remove the SetProvideFeedback() method in gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:629?

Probably, none of this makes any sense, but just in case.
